sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Button, FormControl, InputLabel, Select, MenuItem, Box } from '@mui/material';

const Controls = ({
  isRunning,
  isPaused,
  isMuted,
  onStart,
  onPause,
  onReset,
  onMute,
  duration,
  setDuration,
  theme,
  setTheme,
  music,
  setMusic,
}) => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: 2, alignItems: 'center' }}>
      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2 }}>
        <Button variant="contained" onClick={onStart} disabled={isRunning && !isPaused}>
          Start
        </Button>
        <Button variant="contained" onClick={onPause} disabled={!isRunning || isPaused}>
          Pause
        </Button>
        <Button variant="contained" onClick={onReset} disabled={!isRunning && !isPaused}>
          Reset
        </Button>
        <Button variant="contained" onClick={onMute}>
          {isMuted ? 'Unmute' : 'Mute'}
        </Button>
      </Box>
      <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', gap: 2 }}>
        <FormControl sx={{ minWidth: 120 }}>
          <InputLabel id="duration-label">Duration (s)</InputLabel>
          <Select
            labelId="duration-label"
            value={duration}
            onChange={(e) => setDuration(parseInt(e.target.value))}
            label="Duration (s)"
          >
            <MenuItem value={4}>4</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value={5}>5</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value={6}>6</MenuItem>
          </Select>
        </FormControl>
        <FormControl sx={{ minWidth: 120 }}>
          <InputLabel id="theme-label">Theme</InputLabel>
          <Select
            labelId="theme-label"
            value={theme}
            onChange={(e) => setTheme(e.target.value)}
            label="Theme"
          >
            <MenuItem value="default">Default</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value="green-purple">Green/Purple</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value="red-yellow">Red/Yellow</MenuItem>
          </Select>
        </FormControl>
        <FormControl sx={{ minWidth: 120 }}>
          <InputLabel id="music-label">Music</InputLabel>
          <Select
            labelId="music-label"
            value={music}
            onChange={(e) => setMusic(e.target.value)}
            label="Music"
          >
            <MenuItem value="none">None</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value="river">River</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value="gong">Gong</MenuItem>
            <MenuItem value="harp">Harp</MenuItem>
          </Select>
        </FormControl>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Controls;
